description: The horse chestnut (Aesculus hippocastanum 'Baumannii') is an amazing tree that showcases its beauty from spring through fall. With its large and elegant pink and white blooms, its dense green foliage and its prickly spines, it is both a visual delight and an ornamental asset to any garden. In autumn, its spiny fruits ripen to a richly colored brown, providing food for wildlife and a unique interest. Its graceful shape and dense, deep green foliage make an attractive backdrop for perennial beds and shrubs. During the wintertime months, its attractive bark provides an interesting texture and contrast. Its impressive size and interesting ornamental features make it an amazing choice for any landscape!
